source: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SEQ_00<tab>Khaishan is so worried he is on the verge of saying something.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SEQ_00<tab>再会の市のカイシャンは、心配事があるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>You can tell from the timidness of Khaishan's nod that he is worried by something.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>心配そうな表情で、こちらを見てきた。
どうやら、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>Khaishan points to the north. The haste with which he extended his arm suggests there is something in that direction which requires your attention.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>心配そうな表情で、北の方角を指さした。
どうやら、なにか助けが必要な事態が起きているらしい。
様子を見に行こう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_010<tab>Oh, thank you so much. That was nearly the end of me. I must thank Khaishan as well for sending help.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_010<tab>助かったよ……ありがとう。
あの魔物に足止めを食らって、連絡もできなかったが、
救援を寄こすとは、さすがカイシャンだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_011<tab>I am quite impressed you understood that you were needed here. Working out exactly what the Qestir are trying to communicate is never easy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_011<tab>あいつ、あまりに無口でびっくりしたろ？
ケスティル族には、言葉は嘘の源だって考え方があるらしくてな、
口を開いたところなんて、見たこともないんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_012<tab>They believe all words to be lies and as such never open their mouths. However, they are both loyal and honest─that is why so many are more than happy to do business with them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_012<tab>だが、口数は少なくても、誠実で、仕事は早い。
そんな奴らだから、彼らのもとには人と物が集まるのさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_013<tab>Tell Khaishan that I will be along shortly. I will set off as soon as I have reloaded my cart.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_013<tab>さて、あいつらを追い払ってくれたなら、もう大丈夫だ。
荷物を積み直したらすぐに向かうと、
「カイシャン」に伝えてくれないか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_014<tab>Tell Khaishan that I will be along shortly. I will set off as soon as I have reloaded my cart.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_MERCHANT02753_000_014<tab>こっちはもう大丈夫だ。
荷物を積み直したらすぐに向かうと、
「カイシャン」に伝えてくれないか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The tension has finally left Khaishan's oh-so-expressive face. You take note of the message of thanks relayed via his warm gaze.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ502_02753_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>カイシャンは、安堵した表情でこちらを見ている。
商人を助けた冒険者に、感謝しているようだ。
差し出された礼を受け取ろう。
